Our users are most excited about
Here are some of the stand out features that Pulse has to offer
Body Part Selection
You can select exactly which body parts you want to workout, and you will instantly be delivered a list of complimentary exercises for your workout.
Exercise Discovery
Find your exercise, and create workouts that complement each other based off of cool exercise that you discover. In our vast database of community driven exercises, the selection is endless.
Progress Logs
Logging reps, sets, and weight allows you to view your history of every workout, so you never have to guess your weights again.
Workout Logging
Log your sets, reps, and weight to achieve results through progressive overload. Use your workout score to help you push further each workout.
Record Your Exercise
Whether it's to track your progress, or inspire others, you can record yourself performing each of your workouts and then edit the videos for optimal results.
The Exercise Vault
Search across our database of exercises we call "The Exercise Vault" to quickly find the exercises you are looking for.
